additional_details.description: Additional information about the planned maintenance.

backup_ip_id.description: The Oracle Cloud ID (OCID) of the backup IP address that's associated with the DB node.

backup_vnic2_id.description: The OCID of the second backup VNIC.

backup_vnic_id.description: The OCID of the backup VNIC.

cpu_core_count.description: Number of CPU cores enabled on the DB node.

created_at.description: The date and time when the DB node was created.

db_server_id.description: The unique identifier of the DB server that is associated with the DB node.

db_storage_size_in_gbs.description: The amount of local node storage, in gigabytes (GBs), allocated on the DB node.

db_system_id.description: The OCID of the DB system.

fault_domain.description: The name of the fault domain the instance is contained in.

floating_ip_address.description: The floating IP address assigned to the DB node.

host_ip_id.description: The OCID of the host IP address that's associated with the DB node.

hostname.description: The host name for the DB node.

maintenance_type.description: The type of database node maintenance. Either VMDB_REBOOT_MIGRATION or EXADBXS_REBOOT_MIGRATION.

memory_size_in_gbs.description: The allocated memory in GBs on the DB node.

oci_resource_anchor_name.description: The name of the OCI resource anchor for the DB node.

ocid.description: The OCID of the DB node.

private_ip_address.description: The private IP address assigned to the DB node.

region.description: Region where this resource will be [managed](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/general/latest/gr/rande.html#regional-endpoints). Defaults to the Region set in the [provider configuration](https://registry.terraform.io/providers/hashicorp/aws/latest/docs#aws-configuration-reference).

software_storage_size_in_gbs.description: The size (in GB) of the block storage volume allocation for the DB system.

status.description: The current status of the DB node.

status_reason.description: Additional information about the status of the DB node.

time_maintenance_window_end.description: End date and time of maintenance window.

time_maintenance_window_start.description: Start date and time of maintenance window.

total_cpu_core_count.description: The total number of CPU cores reserved on the DB node.

vnic2_id.description: The OCID of the second VNIC.
